August 27, 2004 POLICY MATTERS TECHNCAL (42/2004) (Decision taken on note of CGM(EW)-II dated 26.08.2004.) Sub: Standardization of civil works contract documents for NHAI funded project under NHDP Phase-II programme. The following Standard' Bidding Documents duly approved by the Chairman to be used in procurement of Civil Contracts on NHDP Phase-II programme are circulated herewith  - Instructions to Bidders (ITB) General Conditions of Contract Part-I Conditions of Particular Application (COPA) - Part-II 242 (V.K.
